Package edu.usfca.cs

Class Artist

java.lang.Object
edu.usfca.cs.Entity
edu.usfca.cs.Artist
public class Artist extends Entity
Artist is the class to create Artist objects for the library Extends the Entity class Has two different constructors Uses setters and getters to retrieve instances of the object To write a file or send a request to a third party data provider it can create following formats: XML, HTML, JSON To write/read from the music.db it creates the right format with the methods: toSQL, fromSQL

Since:
1.0
Author:
Gizem Hazal Senturk
